definition: Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
Mawei harbor, the harbor of Fuzhou city
Mawei river through Fuzhou city
Mawei River naval college, alternative name for Fuzhou naval college 福州船政學堂|福州船政学堂, set up in 1866 by the Qing dynasty
pinyin: Ma3 wei3 shui3 shi1 xue2 tang2

definition: lit. like tofu strung on horsetail, you can't lift it/fig. let's not talk of this (pun on 提[ti2])
pinyin: ma3 wei3 chuan1 dou4 fu5 , ti2 bu5 qi3 lai5

definition: Mawei naval base at Fuzhou city (in Qing times)
ponytail

sentences.english: The distribution area is mainly the acid yellow soil, and associated species is mainly masson's pine.
sentences.chinese: 分佈區主要爲黃壤類酸性土，伴生樹種主要爲馬尾松。

sentences.english: She wears her hair in a pony-tail.
The port of Mawei, the main port of Fuzhou, is located in the alluvial delta of the Fuzhou Basin.
sentences.chinese: 處在四周由中低山環抱的福州盆地內的馬尾港。

sentences.english: They are not Chinese red pines.
The distribution of Masson Pine forest is very wide in the upper ana middle reaches of Yangtse River.
sentences.chinese: 長江中上游地區馬尾松林的分佈非常廣泛。

sentences.english: "Wow, " she said, "today I get to wear my hair in a pony tail.
sentences.chinese: 她自語道，“今天我可以梳個馬尾頭了。”

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the bioactive constituents of marine brown alga Sargassum carpophyllum J.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究褐藻葉托馬尾藻的活性成分。

sentences.english: The blood flow of cauda equina was measured with laser Doppler flowmeter.
sentences.chinese: 應用激光多普勒血流儀檢測馬尾神經血流量。

sentences.english: There is a bow at the end of the ponytail.
sentences.chinese: 在馬尾辮末尾變成躬行。

sentences.english: In addition, there is a cup-shaped canister and a bow made of horsehair.
sentences.chinese: 另外，二胡有一個杯形狀的琴筒和用馬尾製成的弓。

sentences.english: Primary report on studying Pinus massoniana pollen.
sentences.chinese: 有關馬尾松花粉研究初報。

sentences.english: I usually tie them a horsetail plait.
sentences.chinese: 我經常把它們紮成馬尾辮。

sentences.english: Tara, 37, has a blond ponytail and huge blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 塔拉37歲，金色馬尾辮，大大的藍眼睛。

sentences.english: You can rather try ponytail or a headband.
sentences.chinese: 試試扎個馬尾辮或頭巾會比較好。
